alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:17PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Twin Falls and southeastern Owyhee Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Murphy Hot Springs, or 11 miles north of Jarbidge, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Black Butte, Poison Butte, Crawfish Crossing, Coonskin Butte, Middle Butte, Murphy Hot Springs, Three Creek, Salls Crossing, Juniper Butte and Cedar Creek Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
